Uses of Class
org.apache.flex.swf.types.ShapeRecord

  • Packages that use ShapeRecord 
    Package Description
    org.apache.flex.compiler.fxg.swf  
    org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom  
    org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.swf  
    org.apache.flex.swf.types
    This package contains classes and interfaces that represent data types that appear in SWF tags or in the SWF header.

    • Uses of ShapeRecord in org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.swf

      Methods in org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.swf that return types with arguments of type ShapeRecord 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static List<ShapeRecord> ShapeHelper.cubicToQuadratic(double startX, double startY, double control1X, double control1Y, double control2X, double control2Y, double anchorX, double anchorY)
      Approximates a cubic Bezier as a series of 4 quadratic CurvedEdgeRecord with the method outlined by Timothee Groleau in ActionScript (which was based on Helen Triolo's approach of using Casteljau's approximation).
      static List<ShapeRecord> ShapeHelper.implicitClosepath(double startX, double startY, double endX, double endY)
      Creates a List of ShapeRecord to draw a line that represents an implicit closepath origin (startX, startY) to the specified coordinates (in pixels).
      static List<ShapeRecord> ShapeHelper.line(double startX, double startY, double endX, double endY)
      Creates a List of ShapeRecord to draw a line from the given origin (startX, startY) to the specified coordinates (in pixels).
      static List<ShapeRecord> ShapeHelper.path(PathNode node, boolean fill, Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
      Note this utility was ported to Java from the ActionScript class 'flex.graphics.Path' - specifically its 'data' property setter function.
      static List<ShapeRecord> ShapeHelper.rectangle(double width, double height)
      Creates a List of ShapeRecord to draw a rectangle from the origin (0.0, 0.0) for the specified width and height (in pixels).
      static List<ShapeRecord> ShapeHelper.rectangle(double startX, double startY, double width, double height)
      Creates a List of ShapeRecord to draw a rectangle from the given origin (startX, startY) for the specified width and height (in pixels).
      static List<ShapeRecord> ShapeHelper.rectangle(double startx, double starty, double width, double height, double radiusX, double radiusY, double topLeftRadiusX, double topLeftRadiusY, double topRightRadiusX, double topRightRadiusY, double bottomLeftRadiusX, double bottomLeftRadiusY, double bottomRightRadiusX, double bottomRightRadiusY)
      Creates a List of ShapeRecord to draw a rectangle from the given origin (startX, startY) for the specified width and height (in pixels) and radiusX and radiusY for rounded corners.
      static List<ShapeRecord> ShapeHelper.straightEdge(double xFrom, double yFrom, double xTo, double yTo)
      Creates a StraightEdgeRecord to represent a line as the delta between the pair of coordinates (xFrom,yFrom) and (xTo,yTo).

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      static Rect ShapeHelper.getBounds(List<ShapeRecord> records, LineStyle ls, AbstractStrokeNode strokeNode)
      Utility method that calculates the minimum bounding rectangle that encloses a list of ShapeRecords, taking into account the possible maximum stroke width of any of the supplied linestyles.
      static void ShapeHelper.replaceStyles(List<ShapeRecord> shapeRecords, int lineStyleIndex, int fillStyle0Index, int fillStyle1Index, Styles styleContext)
      Replaces the style information for the all the StyleChangeRecords in a list of ShapeRecords.
      static void ShapeHelper.setPathStyles(List<ShapeRecord> shapeRecords, int lineStyleIndex, int fillStyle0Index, int fillStyle1Index, Styles styles)
      Sets the style information for the all the StyleChangeRecords in a list of ShapeRecords.
      static void ShapeHelper.setStyles(List<ShapeRecord> shapeRecords, int lineStyleIndex, int fillStyle0Index, int fillStyle1Index, Styles styles)
      Sets the style information for the first StyleChangeRecord in a list of ShapeRecords.

    • Uses of ShapeRecord in org.apache.flex.swf.types

      Subclasses of ShapeRecord in org.apache.flex.swf.types 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CurvedEdgeRecord
      The curved-edge record stores the edge as two X-Y deltas.
      class  EdgeRecord
      Edge records have a TypeFlag of 1.
      class  EndShapeRecord
      The end shape record simply indicates the end of the shape record array.
      class  StraightEdgeRecord
      The StraightEdgeRecord stores the edge as an X-Y delta.
      class  StyleChangeRecord
      The style change record is also a non-edge record.
